entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over higher terrain. Clearing this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
